channel.title: Apocalypse Keys Season 2 [Playtest - Series]
channel.description:
![cody-board-vf_LJrRYiQM-unsplash|690x460](upload://xnyIV0tOwRkrZUJXG5LV9CGZUfd.jpeg)
**NOTE: Please only sign up if you're interested in playtesting!**
The all access time for this game is June 13, 2020 10:00 PM Manila Time (GMT+8)
***The Apocalypse is coming, and humanity is desperate. We need monsters to defeat monsters. We are those monsters.***
***To unlock the Doors to the Apocalypse, we must gather enough Keys: of knowledge, wisdom, secrets.***
***This is a story of mystery, found family, of monsters that are heroes.***
This is a second season, but new players are welcome to join!
I will email everyone a week ahead to confirm attendance.
Apocalypse Keys is a *Powered by the Apocalypse* game, inspired by the mechanics of Libreté, Changeling: The Lost Pbta, Hearts of Wulin, and Brindlewood Bay. Gain tokens of Darkness by giving into your monstrous nature, but make sure the Darkness doesn't get too close...
**Touchstones:** Mostly Hellboy (both the comics and movies), touched of Supernatural (the tv series) and Hellsing (the anime). Strong Urban Fantasy elements that focus on supernatural horror and mystery.
**Content Warning** : This is a game that focuses on horror, the supernatural, emotional relationships, and romance.
**System** : Apocalypse Keys (Powered by the Apocalypse)
**Duration** : Five 3 hour sessions
**Breaks** : 2 breaks per session (5-10 mins)
**Venue** : GM’s Zoom
**Recording** : Yes, but made public only if consent by all the players
**Attendance** : Joining all five sessions is ideal but not required
**Safety** : Lines & Veils, Script Change, an open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players.
This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gauntlet-rpg.com%2Fcommunity-code-of-conduct.html&v=3).
**session 1** : [date=2020-07-04 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9TUVoAgT2CkKyYHghc
**session 2** : [date=2020-07-11 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9TUkABnksXGw3Urvgk
**session 3** : [date=2020-07-18 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9TUw7gTE4wsRxDoaCH
**session 4** : [date=2020-07-25 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9TV5Vm3kGnTMQ6ts84
**session 5** : [date=2020-08-01 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9TVENi8KpegHA_IorX

item.title: Apocalypse Keys Season 2 [Playtest - Series]
item.dc:creator: @swordqueen
item.description:

NOTE: Please only sign up if you’re interested in playtesting!

The all access time for this game is June 13, 2020 10:00 PM Manila Time (GMT+8)

The Apocalypse is coming, and humanity is desperate. We need monsters to defeat monsters. We are those monsters.

To unlock the Doors to the Apocalypse, we must gather enough Keys: of knowledge, wisdom, secrets.

This is a story of mystery, found family, of monsters that are heroes.

This is a second season, but new players are welcome to join!

I will email everyone a week ahead to confirm attendance.

Apocalypse Keys is a Powered by the Apocalypse game, inspired by the mechanics of Libreté, Changeling: The Lost Pbta, Hearts of Wulin, and Brindlewood Bay. Gain tokens of Darkness by giving into your monstrous nature, but make sure the Darkness doesn’t get too close…

Touchstones: Mostly Hellboy (both the comics and movies), touched of Supernatural (the tv series) and Hellsing (the anime). Strong Urban Fantasy elements that focus on supernatural horror and mystery.

Content Warning : This is a game that focuses on horror, the supernatural, emotional relationships, and romance.

System : Apocalypse Keys (Powered by the Apocalypse)

Duration : Five 3 hour sessions

Breaks : 2 breaks per session (5-10 mins)

Safety : Lines & Veils, Script Change, an open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players.

This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
